credit_line: Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
title: Soldiers in a Field
medium: Graphite on wove paper, mounted in an album
description: Recto: Horizontal view of lines of soldiers in a field with five single soldiers, in the foreground, forming a circle and possibly drumming, with a high margin at bottom, and color notations at various points.  Verso: Vertical sketch with head and cap next to numbers at top, followed by cross-hatchings of possible barbed wire fences at center; a long column of soldiers winding into the far distance at bottom (see related works).
name: Drawing
